subject: Sponsorship/Partnership Inquiry – Simsonn Plus X Pedals
description_text:
Hi Team Simsonn,

I hope you're well.

My name is Josh/STR33TRAC3R, and I’m a Sim Racing content creator and streamer. I'm currently using Moza SRP Lite pedals, but I feel I’ve reached their performance limit and am now looking to upgrade.

After researching various options, I believe the Simsonn Plus X P3-H3 Pedals with the baseplate in black would be the perfect next step in my sim racing journey.

With that in mind, I wanted to reach out to explore the possibility of a sponsorship or a larger discount on this set. In return, I’d be happy to create and share detailed promotional content including unboxing, setup, customization, and live feedback during my streams.

I’m also racing in the upcoming 24 Hours of Barcelona Sim Race on October 18th, and would love the opportunity to showcase the Plus X pedals during this endurance event.

To gauge interest, I posted a TikTok about these pedals and it received 373 views within the first few hours:
https://www.tiktok.com/@str33trac3r/photo/7551042986319138070

I’d love to discuss a potential partnership further if this is something your team is open to.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,

? Josh Martin / STR33TRAC3R

Streamer | Sim Racer | Content Creator
? Twitch: STR33TRAC3R - Twitch<https://www.twitch.tv/str33trac3r>
? Twitter: Josh Martin (@STR33TRAC3R19) / X<https://x.com/STR33TRAC3R19>
? TikTok: STR33TRAC3R (@str33trac3r) | TikTok<https://www.tiktok.com/@str33trac3r>
? YouTube: https://youtube.com/@STR33TRAC3R

conversations.body_text: Hi Josh,  Thank you very much for reaching out and for your interest in the Simsonn Plus X pedals. We really appreciate the effort you’ve already made to showcase our products to your community.  While we’re not currently offering full sponsorships for this product, we’d be happy to support you with a special discount. Please use the code SN15 at checkout to receive 15% off the Simsonn Plus X Pedals.  We look forward to seeing your upcoming content and are excited that you’ll be featuring our pedals in the 24 Hours of Barcelona Sim Race!  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Hi Simsonn Team,

Thank you very much for supporting my content with the 15% discount, I look forward to purchasing the pedals next week when I get paid! Do you have any socials I can follow and tag for the content? I couldn’t find any

Kind Regards,
Josh


? Josh Martin / STR33TRAC3R
Streamer | Sim Racer | Content Creator
? Twitch: STR33TRAC3R - Twitch<https://www.twitch.tv/str33trac3r>
? Twitter: Josh Martin (@STR33TRAC3R19) / X<https://x.com/STR33TRAC3R19>
? TikTok: STR33TRAC3R (@str33trac3r) | TikTok<https://www.tiktok.com/@str33trac3r>
